alert.note: Alert for Kaibab Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 05 at 4:57AM MST until March 05 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM THIS MORNING TO 11 PM MST THIS EVENING ABOVE 5500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 5500 feet. Total snow accumulations of up to 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Areas above 5500 feet near Jacob Lake. * WHEN...From 9 AM this morning to 11 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow showers develop this morning, with the heaviest and most widespread shower acitivty later this afternoon and evening. Showers then begin to diminish overnight tonight. Snow forecast from 9 AM Today to 11 PM Today: Jacob Lake 2 to 4 inches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
